fields.name: Perimeter network recon
fields.desc: Perform perimeter network reconnaissance/scanning.

fields.name: Sniff exposed networks
fields.desc: Perform network sniffing of exposed networks.

fields.name: Open source discovery
fields.desc: Gather information using open source discovery of organizational information

fields.name: Targeted recon
fields.desc: Perform reconnaissance and surveillance of targeted organizations.

fields.name: Malware-focused internal recon
fields.desc: Perform malware-directed internal reconnaissance.

fields.name: Phishing attacks
fields.desc: Craft phishing attacks.

fields.name: Spear phishing attacks
fields.desc: Craft spear phishing attacks.

fields.name: Deployed IT env attacks
fields.desc: Craft attacks specifically based on deployed information technology environment.

fields.name: Counterfeit/spoof website
fields.desc: Create counterfeit/spoof websites.

fields.name: Counterfeit certificates
fields.desc: Create counterfeit certificates.

fields.name: Create false organization
fields.desc: Create and operate false front organizations to inject malicious components into the supply chain.

fields.name: Known malware
fields.desc: Deliver known malware to internal organizational systems (e.g. virus via email).

fields.name: Modified malware
fields.desc: Deliver modified malware to internal organizational information systems.

fields.name: Targeted control malware
fields.desc: Deliver targeted malware for control of internal systems and exfiltration of data.

fields.name: Malware via removable media
fields.desc: Deliver malware by providing removable media.

fields.name: Downloadable untarget malware
fields.desc: Insert untargeted malware into downloadable software and/or into commercial information technology products.

fields.name: Targeted malware
fields.desc: Insert targeted malware into organizational information systems and information system components.

fields.name: Specialized malware
fields.desc: Insert specialized malware into organizational information systems based on system configurations.

fields.name: Counterfeit hardware
fields.desc: Insert counterfeit or tampered hardware into the supply chain

fields.name: Tampered critical hardware
fields.desc: Insert tampered critical components into organizational systems.

fields.name: General-purpose sniffers
fields.desc: Install general-purpose sniffers on organization-controlled information sniffers or networks

fields.name: Targeted sniffers
fields.desc: Install persistent and targeted sniffers on organization-controlled information systems and networks.

fields.name: Malicious scanning devices
fields.desc: Insert malicious scanning devices (e.g. wireless sniffers) inside facilities.

fields.name: Subverted individuals
fields.desc: Insert subverted individuals into organizations.

fields.name: Subverted privileged individua
fields.desc: Insert subverted individuals into privileged positions in organizations

fields.name: Staff physical access
fields.desc: Exploit physical access of authorized staff to gain access to organizational facilities.

fields.name: Exposed IT mistakes
fields.desc: Exploit poorly configured or unauthorized information systems exposed to the internet.

fields.name: Split tunneling
fields.desc: Exploit split tunneling.

fields.name: Cloud multi-tenancy
fields.desc: Exploit multi-tenancy in a cloud environment.

fields.name: Known mobile vulns
fields.desc: Exploit known vulnerabilities in mobile systems (e.g. laptops, PDSs, smart phones).

fields.name: Recent vulns
fields.desc: Exploit recently discovered vulnerabilities

fields.name: Internal IT vulns
fields.desc: Exploit vulnerabilities on internal organizational information systems.

fields.name: Zero day attacks
fields.desc: Exploit vulnerabilities using zero-day attacks

fields.name: Timed IT exploit
fields.desc: Exploit vulnerabilities in information systems timed with organizational/business operations tempo.

fields.name: Multi-tenant data deletion
fields.desc: Exploit insecure or incomplete data deletion in multi-tenant environment.

fields.name: Multi-tenant isolation
fields.desc: Violate isolation in multi-tenant environment.

fields.name: Physical IT compromise
fields.desc: Compromise critical information systems via physical access.

fields.name: Reintroduced system
fields.desc: Compromise information systems or devices used externally and reintroduced into the enterprise.

fields.name: Critical software
fields.desc: Compromise software of organizational critical information systems.

fields.name: Data exfil compromise
fields.desc: Compromise organizational information systems to facilitate exfiltration of data/information.

fields.name: Critical info
fields.desc: Compromise mission-critical information.

fields.name: Hardware (upstream)
fields.desc: Compromise design, manufacture, and/or distribution of information system components (including hardware, software, and firmware).

fields.name: Comm interception attacks
fields.desc: Conduct communications interception attacks.

fields.name: Wireless jamming attacks
fields.desc: Conduct wireless jamming attacks.

fields.name: Unauthorized protocol attacks
fields.desc: Conduct attacks using unauthorized ports, protocols, and services.

fields.name: Data transit attacks
fields.desc: Conduct attacks leveraging traffic/data movement allowed across perimeter.

fields.name: DoS attacks
fields.desc: Conduct simple Denial of Service (DoS) attacks.

fields.name: DDoS attacks
fields.desc: Conduct Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks.

fields.name: Targeted DoS attacks
fields.desc: Conduct targeted Denial of Service (DoS) attacks.

fields.name: Physical attacks
fields.desc: Conduct physical attacks on organizational facilities.

fields.name: Infrastructure physical attack
fields.desc: Conduct physical attacks on infrastructures supporting organizational facilities.

fields.name: Cyber-physical attacks
fields.desc: Conduct cyber-physical attacks on organizational facilities (e.g. remotely change HVAC settings).

fields.name: Cloud data scavenging
fields.desc: Conduct data scavenging attacks in a cloud environment.

fields.name: Brute force attacks
fields.desc: Conduct brute force login attempts/password guessing attempts

fields.name: Nontargeted zero-day
fields.desc: Conduct nontargeted zero-day attacks.

fields.name: External session hijacking
fields.desc: Conduct externally-based session hijacking.

fields.name: Internal session hijacking
fields.desc: Conduct internally-based session hijacking.

fields.name: External MitM modification
fields.desc: Conduct externally-based network traffic modification (man in the middle) attacks.

fields.name: Internal MitM modification
fields.desc: Conduct internally-based network traffic modification (man in the middle) attacks.

fields.name: Outsider social eng
fields.desc: Conduct outsider-based social engineering to obtain information.

fields.name: Insider social eng
fields.desc: Conduct insider-based social engineering to obtain information.

fields.name: Critical personal devices
fields.desc: Conduct attacks targeting and compromising personal devices of critical employees.

fields.name: Supply chain attacks
fields.desc: Conduct supply chain attacks targeting and exploiting critical hardware, software, or firmware.

fields.name: External sensitive info sniff
fields.desc: Obtain sensitive information through network sniffing of internal networks.

fields.name: Exfil sensitive info
fields.desc: Obtain sensitive information via exfiltration.

fields.name: Degradation of services
fields.desc: Cause degradation or denial of attacker-selected services or capabilities.

fields.name: Deterioration of systems
fields.desc: Cause deterioration/destruction of critical information system components and functions.

fields.name: Public data integrity loss
fields.desc: Cause integrity loss by creating, deleting, and/or modifying data on publicly accessible information systems (e.g. web defacement).

fields.name: Critical data integrity loss
fields.desc: Cause integrity loss by polluting or corrupting critical data.

fields.name: False data injection
fields.desc: Cause integrity loss by injecting false but believable data into organizational information systems.

fields.name: Cause authorized disclusure
fields.desc: Cause disclosure of critical and/or sensitive information by authorized users.

fields.name: Cause unauthorized disclosure
fields.desc: Cause unauthorized disclosure and/or unavailability by spilling sensitive information

fields.name: External wireless interception
fields.desc: Obtain information by externally located interception of wireless network traffic.

fields.name: Unauthorized access
fields.desc: Obtain unauthorized access.

fields.name: Obtain public sensitive data
fields.desc: Obtain sensitive data/information from publicly accessible information systems.

fields.name: Scavenge sensitive data
fields.desc: Obtain information by opportunistically stealing or scavenging information systems/components.

fields.name: Obfuscate actions
fields.desc: Obfuscate adversary actions.

fields.name: Surveil and adapt
fields.desc: Adapt cyber attacks based on detailed surveillance.

fields.name: Multi-staged attack campaign
fields.desc: Coordinate a campaign of multi-staged attacks (e.g. hopping)

fields.name: Internal/external campaign
fields.desc: Coordinate a campaign that combines internal and external attacks across multiple information systems and information technologies.

fields.name: Multi-org campaign
fields.desc: Coordinate campaigns across multiple organizations to acquire specific information or achieve desired outcome.

fields.name: Presence spreading campaign
fields.desc: Coordinate a campaign that spreads attacks across organizational systems from existing presence.

fields.name: Surveil and adapt campaign
fields.desc: Coordinate a campaign of continuous, adaptive, and changing cyber attacks based on detailed surveillance.

fields.name: Outside/inside/supply vectors
fields.desc: Coordinate cyber attacks using external (outsider), internal (insider), and supply chain (supplier) attack vectors.

fields.name: Authorized data mishandling
fields.desc: Mishandling of critical and/or sensitive information by authorized users.

fields.name: Comm contention
fields.desc: Degraded Communications performance due to contention.

fields.name: Unreadable display
fields.desc: Display unreadable due to aging equipment

fields.name: Primary facil earthquake
fields.desc: Earthquake at primary facility.

fields.name: Backup facil earthquake
fields.desc: Earthquake at backup facility.

fields.name: Primary facil fire
fields.desc: Fire at primary facility.

fields.name: Backup facil fire
fields.desc: Fire at backup facility

fields.name: Primary facil flood
fields.desc: Flood at primary facility.

fields.name: Backup facil flood
fields.desc: Flood at backup facility.

fields.name: Primary facil hurricane
fields.desc: Hurricane at primary facility.

fields.name: Backup facil hurricane
fields.desc: Hurricane at backup facility.

fields.name: Resource depletion
fields.desc: Degraded processing performance due to resource depletion.

fields.name: Vulnerability intro
fields.desc: Introduction of vulnerabilities into software products.

fields.name: Disk error
fields.desc: Corrupted storage due to a disk error.

fields.name: Pervasive disk error
fields.desc: Multiple disk errors due to aging a set of devices all acquired at the same time, from the same supplier.

fields.name: Primary facil windstorm
fields.desc: Windstorm/tornado at primary facility.

fields.name: Backup facil windstorm
fields.desc: Windstorm/tornado at backup facility.
